message: I just saw a job description that requested a link to your github profile. Do you think this is invasion of privacy?

data.message: your facebook and instagram and twitter are also public. should you be giving these handles over to the interviewing company? - they will be able to see your comments/issue/code - good or bad
لأ أنا فعلاً دلوقتي مبقتش عارف إنت بتتكلم بجد ولا بتـ troll 😂😂
Why would you push anything to github in a public repo if you don't want others to have access to it ??

Not every skilled developer puts his work on github.. 
Job requirements are getting stranger everyday!!
انا تقريبا السي في بتاعي مكنتش كاتب فيه حاجة .. حطيتلهم لينك Bitbucket :D
المشكلة دلوقتي .... لو كنت شغال ع github  بس في private repo related to my work .... أظن كده البروفايل بتاعي ولا له لازمة كأنه فاضي ..... صح ؟
ال private repos بتبقى لأعمال خاصة أو حتى تبع الشركة الي بتشتغل فيها وهما مش هيشوفوا منها غير شكلها في ال production بس لكن هما بيبقى يهمهم يعرفوا مساهماتك عموما وشغلك ال open source

Jazakallahu khairan to those who took my question seriously. Jazakallahu who answered in any way. Participation is important in life. And jazakallahu khairan to those who read. Inshallah we all learned something from this discussion 

And finally a big thank you for not belittling me or my question

No it's the major proof of your development talent 
From my point of view your github and stackoverflow is what tells me why your are  doing development  ,motivated by money or loving the techno
